name: 蔡逸萍
objective: 本課程著重分析中英文之句型, 語法, 慣用語等表達方式及比較其異同之處,並以密集練習及詳細解說交替, 使學生在兩種語言思考間運用自如。
schedule:
WEEK　　SESSION THEME
1　　Introduction
2     　　What is translation?
Evangelism Parable: Cross-Cultural Translation Problems
3     　　Translation: skills and strategies I
4     　　Translation: skills and strategies II
5    　　Translation: skills and strategies III
6    　　Translation: Theory and practice I (practical texts: advertisement)
7    　　Translation: Theory and practice II (practical texts: brochures)
8    　　Translation: Theory and practice III (practical texts: public signs)
9    　　Translation and culture 
10   　　Translation and business I
11   　　Translation and business II
12   　　Translation and media: subtitling I 
13   　　Translation and media: subtitling II
14   　　Translation and media: subtitling III
15   　　Group presentation and discussion I
16   　　Group presentation and discussion II
17   　　Wrap-up
18    　　Final
scorePolicy:
Attendance
ATTENDANCE IS MANDATORY. Students who miss more than 4 class sessions fail the course. 

Assessment:
-　　25% on group presentations
-　　30% on final examination
-　　45% on continual assessments: attendance to lectures; in-class performance; HOMEWORK
materials:

1.　　英漢翻譯教程 張培基等編著/書林 (required)
2.　　英漢比較與翻譯 陳定安著/書林
3.　　英漢句型對比與翻譯 陳定安著／書林
4.　　翻譯實務 周兆祥著/台灣商務印書館
5.　　BASSNETT, Susan. Translation Studies (New Accents). New York: Routledge, 2002
6.　　MUNDAY, Jeremy, Introducing Translation Studies. Theories and Applications, New York / London, Routledge, 2008
7.　　HOUSE, Juliane. Translation. Oxford: Oxford University Press, 2009
